response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a price of $11,000 for this exceptional item. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also provides you with significant savings compared to its market value of $12,000. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your business capabilities together.", "product_price": 11000}
